abstract: Number of traffic deaths in US rises 8.1 percent in first half of 2015, prompting National Highway Traffic Safety Admin officials to consider effects of vehicular smartphone usage; represents biggest six-month jump in traffic deaths since 1977.
lead_paragraph: The number of deaths from traffic crashes in the United States jumped 8.1 percent in the first half of 2015 from a year earlier, officials said.

headline.main: Traffic Deaths Rose in First Half of Year
headline.print_headline: Traffic Deaths Rose in First Half of Year

snippet: The number of deaths from traffic crashes in the United States jumped 8.1 percent in the first half of 2015 from a year earlier, officials said.
